import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import styles from '../pages/index.module.css' type propsType = { name: string, tags: string[], number_of_reviews: number, rating: number, imgUrl: string } const Attraction = (props: propsType) =>

{props.name}

Rating: {props.rating} | {props.number_of_reviews} Reviews

{props.tags.join(', ')}

export default Attraction
